features.subheader: Ideoxan provides content rich features and courses

feature0.title: Open Source
feature0.description: All of our content is open to be modified and used by anyone. Our GitHub holds all of the code used to power the website and the courses. These courses can be used in any environment as they are licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 License

feature1.title: Free
feature1.description: All of our basic, introductory content is free to use forever under our Free Forever Guarantee. This includes our Introduction to HTML, Introduction to CSS, Introduction to JavaScript (DOM), Introduction to JavaScript (Node.js), and our Introduction to Python Courses.

feature2.title: Interactive
feature2.description: All of our courses are 100% interactive. Quizzes and tutorials are included with each lesson. The Ideoxan Lesson Editor is a fully robust IDE in the browser powered by the Ace Editor. It features a code editor with syntax highlighting, problem reporting, and a dynamic viewport/terminal.

editorFeatures.subheader: A sneak peek at our robust, in-browser Integrated Development Environment

feature0.title: Easy to Use
feature0.description: The editor uses a flat and minimal interface that anyone, from professional software developers to starters, can use. The editor resembles an actual Integrated Development Environment (IDE) meaning making the switch to an external program is easy.

feature1.title: Responsive
feature1.description: The Editor works on multiple displays. This means that programming on any device is a breeze. Learning programming on the go has never been easier!

feature2.title: Real Time Editing
feature2.description: The viewport updates automatically to run your code in real time. Every time you make a change, your code is uploaded and saved so you can resume your work later.

feature3.title: Document Manipulation
feature3.description: This is a step above your ordinary word processor or text editor. The online editor features syntax highlighting that is customizable, the ability to undo/redo, a tabbed document interface, keyboard shortcuts, error reporting, and much more.
